idea: Exodus is a trusted pan-India Value-added Distributor with in-house resources for end-to-end support. We have also launched our own brand - BRX which we wish to establish in India as well as in the Global markets. We currently represent multiple international brands. Exodus; focus is extremely partner-centric and endeavours to work along with partners to customise solutions that not only addresses their client’s brief but also gives them a distinct commercial advantage over their competition. We also assist partners who are new to the industry to undertake turnkey AV projects from inception to installation. In a small yet definitive manner we have begun introducing AV to the infrastructure integrators.
name: Exodus Information Technology Pvt. Ltd.

idea: I procure medical devices manufactured in India and bid for government tenders. So my business model not only helps drive sales for Indian manufacturers but also reduces the cost to the Indian Government as otherwise they would probably purchase imported items which are more costly. So my business model is a catalyst for making India Atmanirbhar. I have been successful in switching the procurement of many government orders to quality Indian manufacturers. My forte lies in providing the marketing and sales resources to the Indian manufacturers
name: Radha Meditech
